REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y f1918 reute u f BC-ESSO-SAF-<ESSF.PA>-YE 03-20 0065

TEXT.TITLE: ESSO SAF <ESSF.PA> YEAR ENDED DEC 31 1986
TEXT.BODY: Net profit 305 mln francs vs 258 mln. Net dividend 25 francs vs 20 francs. Operating loss 696 mln francs vs 1.46 billion. Note - The company, which is the French subsidiary of Exxon Corp. <XON.N>, said its net profit result included the reintegration of 1.2 billion francs of provisions for exchange fluctuations. Reuter
